Case No.: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Dear [Insert Name]
WITHOUT PREJUDICE
Consignment No: [Insert Consignment #] Despatch Date: [Insert Despatch Date] Destination: [Insert Destination] Result of investigation: [ Eg. Star Track was unable to find the 1 carton or provide proof of delivery on the above consignment]
Our conditions of cartage referred to in our quotation and on our consignment notes clearly state that we are not ‘Common Carriers’ and that insurance is not included within the transport service provided
Transit Warranty is offered as a separate service and is separately chargeable when requested by the consignor for those specific goods on the relative consignment note. In this instance Transit Warranty was not requested for the consignment, and consequently we are unable to process a claim as requested. Please refer your claim to your regular insurer who will require a copy of this letter to confirm that the goods were not also under Transit Warranty cover with the carrier.
Yours sincerely
